sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMMER an instrument used sor driving down stones or piles into the ground; or for beating the earth, in order to render it more solid for a foundation.
Rammer os a Gun, the Gm-Î²iek ; a rod used in charging of a gun, to drive home the powder, as also the shot, and the wad which keeps the shot from rosling out.
